meanings.definition: In poor condition; shabby or worn out.
meanings.sent1: The tattiest old chair in the room creaked loudly when sat on.
meanings.sent2: The tattiest shirt he owned had holes in the sleeves.
meanings.sent3: Even the tattiest umbrella would have been better than getting soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her tattiest shoes were like old friends, comfortable but falling apart.
meanings.sent5: The tattiest book on the shelf had pages yellowed with age.

meanings.sent1: The tattiest pizza I ever had was cold and flavorless.
meanings.sent2: The tattiest movie they watched had terrible acting and a confusing plot.
meanings.sent3: Eating the tattiest sandwich was like chewing on cardboard.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were the tattiest attempts at humor, always falling flat.
meanings.sent5: The tattiest painting in the gallery looked like a child's finger painting.
